hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks on the chart to help us solve.

We can put our two numbers together on the place value chart.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/6fcd13c9d927e6d99593639af40bd7c6ef3b3370)

Now, there are $6\text{ hundreds}, 6\text{ tens}$ and $9\text{ ones}$.

In all, there are $6\text{ hundreds}, 6\text{ tens}$ and $9\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/dec7383dd88eb3df55422c11bc21a068a758933c)

$600+ 60+ 9= 669$
